# 1977 Alan King Tennis Classic – Singles

Jimmy Connors
| runner   =  Raúl Ramírez
| score    = 6–4, 5–7, 6–2
| draw     = 32
| seeds    = 16
| type     = singles doubles
}}
First-seeded Jimmy Connors retained his title, defeating second-seeded Raúl Ramírez in the final.
